title: The Antique collector
creator_credit: Barr Films and Jerry A Callner
brief_description: Tells the story of an elderly woman and her young helper who enjoy working together at the flea market, until a stranger makes a remarkable offer to buy and care for the woman. Focuses on the needs and feelings of the elderly in modern society.
